<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Sun's Fury](/Spells.aspx?ID=818)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 101</row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 weapon without an [_unholy_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=307) rune that is unattended or wielded by you or a willing ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

The target weapon becomes wreathed in a glowing flame. The weapon deals an additional 1d4 fire and 1 good damage on a successful Strike. In addition, the flame causes the weapon to glow as bright as a [torch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60). You can Dismiss the spell.
name: Sun's Fury
